title: What songs give a feeling of being free and happy? - Quora

response.answer_text: King - - Lauren Aquilina  Sweet - - Cigarettes After Sex  The Story Never Ends - - Lauv  Clean Eyes - - SYML  This Town - - Kygo | Sasha Sloan

Sea of Voices by Porter Robinson This song is white freeing. It is slow, non-intrusive, and carries a gradual buildup. But like the best things in life, it’s release is nearly unparalleled. I would highly recommend listening eyes-closed, with headphones, and your volume at the highest that is within your comfort level. Enjoy this surreal experience, and have fun :)
